data.label: Jetpack Credentials
data.description: 该库提供对用户凭据的统一访问，包括密码、通行密钥和联合凭据。应使用此库提供无缝和安全的登录体验。

data.label: Jetpack Credentials
data.description: This library provides unified access to a user's credentials. This can include passwords, passkeys and federated credentials. This library should be used to provide seamless and secure sign-in experiences.
